      • validate

        public SAMLValidatorResult validate(org.opensaml.saml2.core.Response response,
                                    org.opensaml.xml.security.credential.Credential encryptionCredential,
                                    org.opensaml.xml.security.credential.Credential signingCredential,
                                    String entityId)
        Validates the assertion in a response and returns significant data in the assertion. Success is indicated in the ok attribute of the result. Exceptions are caught and converted to String into the errMsg attribute of the result.
        Parameters:
        response - A SAML response obtained from the IdP.
        encryptionCredential - Optional (nullable) encryption credential (private key and public certificate of the service provider), required when an encrypted assertion is present in the response. Should be loaded from a locally stored keystore.
        signingCredential - Signing credential (public certificate) of the identity provider. Needed to check the validity of the assertion signature. The IdP signing certificate can be obtanined from filesystem or HTTP metadata.
        entityId - Our entity Id, so that only assertions intended for us can be used to authenticate.
        Returns:
        Succes or fail (with error message) of the response's assertion validation, with misc attributes from the assertion claims.

      • validate

        public SAMLValidatorResult validate(org.opensaml.saml2.core.Assertion assertion,
                                    org.opensaml.xml.security.credential.Credential signingCredential,
                                    String entityId)
        Validate.
        Parameters:
        assertion - assertion
        signingCredential - signing credential
        entityId - entity id
        Returns:
        SAML validator result
